main.name: Mahesh Ravi
main.occupation: React and React Native Developer @ Condé Nast
main.description: Convert Figma designs into Real time Websites and Mobile applications
main.bio: Hi there! I am Mahesh! I've been coding for over 5 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. I'm very much excited in building Web and mobile applications from Scratch.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
work.description: Working through the entire software development Lifecycle and exploring innovative and Efficient ways to solve problems, Worked React and React Native and also with Cloud technologies (AWS and Azure)

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked on as E-commerce application, Optimized it as much as possible to provide user be best experience during their purchase

testimonials.text: Mahesh is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
The product design from Mahesh was very much methodical and well planned, It was a great working with him.
